hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) used to seek refuge with Allah saying, "O Allah! I seek refuge with You from laziness, and seek refuge with You from cowardice, and seek refuge with You from geriatric old age, and seek refuge with You from miserliness

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّعَوُّذِ مِنْ أَرْذَلِ الْعُمُرِ. {أَرَاذِلُنَا} أَسْقَاطُنَا
chapter.eng-name: To seek refuge with Allah from senile old age
